param.name: upper_y
param.label: upper limit for the y intercept
param.help: The upper y-intercept value to isolate noise peaks in the equation for the KMD plot: y = 0.001123*x + b. Default value is set to 0.2, so that it does not interact with any potentially double-charged peaks.

param.name: lower_y
param.label: lower limit for the y intercept
param.help: The lower y-intercept value to isolate noise peaks in the equation for the KMD plot: y = 0.001123*x + b. Default value is set to 0.05 to ensure no analyte peaks are incorporated into the noise estimation.

param.name: upper_x
param.label: upper limit for the x intercept
param.help: If not set, it defaults to maximum mass in the mass spectrum.

param.name: lower_x
param.label: lower limit for the x intercept
param.help: If not set, it defaults to minimum mass in the mass spectrum.
